lib

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.Recipe

  • public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the details related to a recipe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Recipe()
      Creates a new empty recipe object.
